,SportTypeName,PhotoStyleName from photophotography ,basicsporttype bst,basicphotostyle bps where 1=1 and bst.SportTypeID = photophotography.SportTypeID and bps.PhotoStyleID = photophotography.StyleTypeID and PictureID = #{0,jdbcType=CHAR} and photophotography.StyleTypeID = #{1,jdbcType=CHAR} and photophotography.SportTypeID = #{2,jdbcType=CHAR}
